casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Samuel Keith THURMAN, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 156768
COA: 340296 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 3, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the October 11, 2017 order of the Court of Appeals is considered and, pursuant to MCR 7.305(H)(1), in lieu of granting leave to appeal, we REMAND this case to the Court of Appeals for consideration of whether the defendant's delayed application for leave to appeal was timely filed by virtue of the prison mailbox rule, MCR 7.205(A)(3).

We do not retain jurisdiction.
